text: Tebe zapytuyutʹ pro molodyy misyatsʹ. Skazhy: «Vin vyznachaye chas dlya lyudey ta dlya zdiysnennya khadzhzhu». Blahochestya zh polyahaye ne v tomu, shchob vkhodyty do budynkiv cherez zadni dveri; ale blahochestyvym ye toy, khto ye bohoboyazlyvym. Tozh vkhodʹte do budynkiv cherez dveri yikhni i biytesʹ Allaha — mozhlyvo, matymete vy uspikh
